title: Lands End - does not warrant any time.
review: Land's End is viewed on your journey up to Nainital or on the way back.  There is no where to stop to get a photograph.  But then why would yo?.  40+ years ago it was a pristine lake and somewhere to enjoy nature.  Now it has been deforested and the lake is not pristine by any imagination.  The overdevelopment of Nainital is now creeping down here.  I agree with Lotusdiamond  don't bother - don't waste your time as a foreigner.

title: Best Place for Photo session and relax
review: From very much height the view of Khurpatal make feel different. Very slippery and risky place but heaven for selfie / photo lovers. you can get refreshments / snacks near this place. Winds also blowing at this top place.

title: Just for an Amazing View of Khurpa Tal
review: This point gives an amazing view of beautiful Khurpa Tal surrounded by beautiful village and Trees. It not required to much time but very good place for photography.

title: Expensive. But a must visit
review: Great views, very windy but if you have never been its worth a visit. Lots of parking and some great gift shops. The views in my opinion are stunning.

title: nice scenic view
review: barapathar area have great scenic views .. ppl come for picnic having gud time .. u have have a long long walk in whole one side of nainital through forest and chill winds

title: Enjoy the best view from here with pleasant weather even in summers
review: Enjoy the best view from here with pleasant weather even in summers.

title: Cliff top with khurpatal lake view
review: A place in the dense forests accessible by horses where the mountain ends and you can get a spectacular view of Khurpataal lake.

title: bad timing
review: one of the tourist places, i unfortunately went in december, and it was damn cloudy and foggy which blocked my entire view...my cab driver informed me that the twisted  tree trunk, that marks the land's end is quite unique and had the weather been clear, the entire birds eye view of the khurpatal lake would be visible, wherein the lake is shaped like a mango...something that not many people know.

title: Nice view but not maintained hygiene
review: This is place from where you can view Khurpatal. This is en route to Tiffin top.

title: Overall ok to visit
review: This place will give you a view of Khurpatal and it's surroundings from an elevated position. You may visit this place but nothing great about it.

title: Beautiful yet dangerous
review: No doubt, this place is extremely beautiful BUT one need to be extremely careful while visiting this place. One single slip, One single mistake may lead to certain death. Be extremely careful.

title: End of the mountain in Nainital
review: The place is located a the end of Mountain with clear view of the horizon which is why it is known as Lands end. One can see beautiful view of the valley below with clear sky in front and a small lake in between. Views are awesome on a clear day.

title: Nice view of Kripatal
review: This is the place from where one can get view of Kripatal lake from top. This is the place whcih can be reached by horse ride or if you are fit enough i advise you to treck. this is a small stop over before you reach China top. I enjoyed trecking. Rs. 800 per person is the charge for horse ride.

title: nice one...
review: this place was very good... it provided the best view of the kripatal lake down in nainital... nice place...

title: Wow and scary view from top of hills
review: It was a heart beting ride to the place and the view was amazing from top. But weak hearted patient should avoid going.

title: good for a picture. One time view only.
review: The view is good but scary. It has some meaning as the hills end here so it makes it more desirable to visit.

title: Barapather as seems land end
review: From this site we can view a beautiful site of khurpatal lake, and seems that there is no land from these peak. a wonderful site where we can take a horse ride and pass his or her time.

title: Careful.... you may fall
review: Well Lands end in Srilanka is a great view but here a small step where 200 people struggles for selfies and else. not a great sight

title: Amazing views
review: This is part of the horse ride that one takes from Bara Pathar. This is the first stop and a huge drop into the value on the Choti Haldwani side. it gives good views of the huge valley below.

title: amazing experience
review: its located at just 4km from the centre of the town. we reached lands end point early morning around 6am, because we plan to see morning views from lands end, very fascinating view. it was a panoramic view of the vivacious khurpa lake or khurpa tal, which holds stagnant but crystal clear water. good place for adventure seekers, nature lovers, photograph fanatics.

title: Zoom out view of entire Naintal with the snow-clad Himalayas in the backdrop!!
review: Initially I was reluctant to go to this place as it a hour-long ride on horse. It is a steep up hill climb but the journey is the destination. Once you reach the end, its the complete end to your visit. It satisfies your mind and makes you feel heavenly. Less crowd during off-season, one can enjoy the beauty of whole Nainital from this place and also snap a glimpse of the snow clad Himalayas from this spot. It is highest point in Nainital and one must spend time here to enjoy the beauty. Enjoy hot Masala tea here, the beauty of this place makes it taste fantastic.

title: nice and awesome view
review: The view point jus completes the trip of nainital. The view is beautiful on the while reaching the place. The crowd was more that time so more tourists and more enjoyable and lively the environment. While you reach there you can enjoy hot tea and other hot food items.

title: Don't waste time here
review: Not a Good Place to visit , just a Waste of time. Better you Spend your time Near Naini jheel , Zoo or Cave Garden

title: High Cliff In Nainital
review: Lands end is a high cliff situated in the outskirts of Nainital.The place offers a picturesque panorama of the low-lying plains and surrounding hills.Villages nestled at the bottom of the valley look spectacular from this place.

title: average place to visit
review: average place to visit...on th road attraction. u can spent 10 15 minutes here & hv a cup of tea. click photo & proceed to nxt destination

title: Enroute to Dorothy seat
review: Good view, this is a slight detour on way to Dorothy seat peak

title: "Enchanted place"
review: Beautiful view of Nainital from the top of the hills! There you can also drink tea and eat food... I recommend to visit this lovely place.

title: Best view. Best Horse ride. Go for it.
review: Best view from the point. Nice horse ride. go for it. All other points that Horse men offer are not worth.

title: Breathtaking view
review: The view from here reaches to a vast spanning distance. You can see the plains from here and the KhurpaTal.

title: Good view, but be very careful
review: Beautiful view of the khurpatal, one of the 7 viewpoints in Nainital. A slope goes down to the point from where you can view, but be very careful. There is literally no boundary and you can fall straight down if not careful. Enjoy the view for a few minutes from a safe distance.

title: Beatiful view
review: Visited this place with Family on our route to Dorothy's seat. Its a beautiful site with scenic views. Nice place.

title: View of Naini Lake and its sarrounding City is best from this place
review: if you want to se the Complete Naini lake and its surrounding from Hill top this is the best place . you can walk up to this point but suggested is the Horse ride . on a horse and riding up to the hill will surely give you adrenaline rush . once you are on top you will forget the pain you have taken to reach there . a must visit.

title: Mango view of the Naini Lage
review: from about 4 km height, you can see the mango shape of the naini lake, from his point a lake makes the shape of Mango.

title: Khurpatal
review: Khurpatal is a small village which is approx 9 km from Nainital. It has a beautiful lake and amazing surroundings. colour of Khurpa Tal changes with the changes in colour of sky.

title: Wonderful Natural View with adventure
review: Lands End is good place to see natural beauty. the way to go there is adventurous. enjoyed horse riding.but if u want to see real beauty then go by horse and come back by walk.

title: Awesome
review: You Can Visit Lands End On Foot, Or Horse Back. Its a wonderful place for family and couples. Lands actually ends here and at the height of 2118 mts the place is excellent to see the natural beauty and view of the plains and hills.

title: Bird's Eye view of Nainital
review: The only way to reach to this view point is via horse ride. The horse ride costs Rs 710 per person and take you to both Land's end and Tiffin Top view point. The horse ride guide does not give you lot of time to spend there and they want to finish the ride soon and move on to next customer. The view is good on a sunny /clear day.

title: Perfect view of Nainital
review: This view point provides the complete view of Nainital. It is a good spot for clicking some pictures and enjoying the view.

title: Nice view of Nainital !!
review: The Lands End is a beautiful viewpoint on the way towards Tiffin top or Dorothy's seat. The viewpoint provides an amazing panoramic view of the valley, the Nainital city and the Khurpa Taal lake.

title: exciting .
review: place comes on the way to tiffin top . small place  at top of mountans  to view whole land of nanital .  u can see beauty of nanital and feid   from there

title: Lands End and Khurpa Taal are same!!
review: Three words to describe this place: Secluded, lake and a Story.

title: Excellent Spot
review: Lands actually ends here and at the height of 2118 mts the place is excellent to see the natural beauty and view of the plains and hills. Excellent place to visit.

title: Good view of Khurpatal from Barapathar
review: We had a wonderful view of Khurpatal from Barapathar. We went on a horse though that was not needed. The drivers know the local guides and they stop near barapthhar forcing you to take guides and horse rides saying that the roads are not motorable. The guides would not do anything simply click some photos and they will force you to ride  on a horse and see some points. They also forced us though in  nice way to see some 3  points which had motorable roads. We went on a horseback because the guide and the driver insisted  but while coming we came on our own car.

title: Just WOW
review: Lands End point is simply unavoidable for its sublime beauty. I took a taxi for local sightseeing and I also did Horseriding (horseriding also covers some points in Nainital which otherwise are not reachable by taxi). I visited Lands End point in both of them and both were different. Maybe it was different views of the same point, Not sure.

title: literally the land just ends
review: Cool wind passes through you by there at the top.We had a wonderful view of Khurpatal from Barapathar.Enjoyed alot there with my friends.

title: Breathtaking View
review: View from this point is breathtaking. You can view Khurpa Lake down there with numerous hills in the horizon. Cool wind passes you by there at the top and you feel as if you are in paradise on earth.

title: Great photos, nothing else
review: The drive to the view point was good, and it really does feel like it is the land's end. Not much to do there except click photos, or contemplate life. Incredible view, though.

title: Nothing interesting
review: You only get a top view of the small lake below -nothing more. Pure cheap travel gimmick which has become rampant in India - where locals assign random fancy names to less than ordinary places (like lovers point , suicide point etc). Not worth it

title: Awesome Landscape
review: Lot of things to do... Pictures, Horse Back Safari, Flying Fox Rope ride.Its a wonderful place for family and couples. That Surprise feeling keeps you on the edge.

title: Just one corner where we stop going ahead-can not be the end of the land
review: Though approachable on foot, everyone seems to be going on horse. On horse it is only a few minutes ride. Some additional activities like rope climbing etc are introduced. Nothing romantic or even adventurous . Secondly the men at the 'GHODA CHALAU SEVA SAMITEE' ticket counter are cheaters, one must inquire properly before taking a ticket.

title: Must Visit
review: If you want to catch a glimpse of Nainital, this is a must visit place!! The most picturesque place..you can capture the beauty from this single point.

title: Thrill
review: This is the most dangerous point.Much care should be taken at this point. We have visited and seen the beauty of Himalayas. The dead end creates thrill to visitors.

title: Mar 2014
review: Picturesque and amazing. You need to take a horse to get there with its trail winding. Getting there you see the most lovely views

title: Nothing much to see here
review: There is nothing much to see here you just look at the lake from the  top and it looks like cows feet that why it is named khurpa taal , if you dont have time you can omit its visit

title: Pretty nice!
review: It seriously is a Land's End. Beautiful views. Access is through Horses on the way to Dorothy's seat.

title: Good View of Khrupatal from Lands End
review: We reached Lands End by Horse while on the way to Dorothy Seat.This is a quite place on height where you can see Khurpatal Lake view & looks like Land end.Not much interesting but worth visit.

title: Deadly drops
review: It is exactly what its name suggests. A good hike from town you will cross barapathar and come to the end of one of the  larger mountains. Thats Land End .... literally the land just ends !Be careful there are sheer drops of over 4000 feet to the plains below  ! Not a place for the faint hearted. Views from its edge are spectacular t and on a good day one might be able to see Kala dungi hovering just aside the outskirts of Corbett park.Limestone cliffs and eagles riding the currents  add to the panorama - a  grand 40 knm view of  the plains  within a 180 arc. Khurptal lake is visible on one side and is treat to watch from this height.

title: Good, if you like outdoors, and a nice view.
review: Most such places provide a decent view, and fresh air.  If you like outdoors, enjoy many such places in this town and surrounding area.

title: Beautiful Views
review: At this point you need to walk very carefully as it is very slippery.

title: Nothing so special
review: Nothing so special to boast about it. In Nainital every where u could find Tal..all are nearly same.

title: Nice view ..
review: Nice view of the hills from here. Can click some great pics here. We reached here by getting horses from Barapathar..

title: Good View Point
review: Visited this view point with my family, and was quite Good. View of the Lake in the backdrop was great, it was little risky as no barriers are in place, one needs to be careful while moving around to take Photos.

title: View of Steep Mountains!!! Take Breath...
review: Stopped here while going to Dorothy Place on horses. Beyond this point if steep downfall of mountains. No land beyond this point, that's why called so.

title: The View
review: The view of the mountains is simply amazing and will leave you dumbfounded for some time. KhurpaTal is best enjoyed from here only.

title: good place
review: Horse is the only way to reach here. After short Horse riding it was a good rest point. View from here is so good. You will love to click some pics from here.

title: Beautiful view from the top
review: Perfectly named as Lands End. This place provides you with a panoramic view of mountains and of course, not to be missed, the beautiful Khurpa Tal. One can reach there only by horse riding. A perfect place to keep your camera clicking.

title: Simply amazing
review: take the horse to the top if u dont want to trek..the horse will take about 15 mins to take u up there and another 15 to come back...the view is beautifull...u get a view of a smaller lake..and jaw dropping scenery.. worth a visit..if ever in nainitall....move away from the crowwded mall road and come here for the real adventure/fun

title: Amazing
review: A beautiful trek above the naini lake and must be done if health allows. Another alternate to reach there is to hire a horse. Shutterbugs paradise.

title: great view
review: Great view from here.

title: Not worth going
review: Its on the way to so called China Peak. We took horse since the the road is so pathetic that you cant walk here. Even the horse was feeling slippery here. You reach this place and will surely search where is land's end. Its named by locals in this way so that tourist can get lured and will shell out money to reach there by horse.

title: OMG
review: Beauty, Feel, Natural Painting of God. you can have Photos clicked by photographers and get it printed for your lifetime memories.

title: Nothing special about it
review: This place is also called suicide point. From this place, view of Khurpatal Lake is good. Nothing more have the potential to attracts.

title: Lands End
review: Magnificient view. Professional photographer who clicked some good family pictures and sent it to the hotel in the evening

title: Place for wallpaper pics
review: This place is at very high altitude and you have to go by car/taxi. Once you reach there you are awestruck by the beauty of the surroundings. Very good panoramic views could be clicked here. The place is very small and they call it Khurpa Tal point. Some people may not like it because its not an attraction as such, just a point from where you could see two tals: Khurpa tal and sarita tal....The view of villages down in the valley is uncomparable. When we went there clouds played hide and seek with sun so got some bful clicks....There's one stall there for tea/coffee/momos and maggi but its very costly. A cup of coffee or tea is for 20 Rs. Of all the points we visited that day this was the best, even better than Snow peak.

title: Worth a visit
review: We visited this point while going to the Dorothy's seat by riding horses. The lands end provides some breathtaking views of the surroundings including that of the Khurpa Taal.A must visit in Nainital if you can ride a horse or can walk for long.

title: Waste of time Dorothy's seat is better
review: Horse ride to lands end is cheaper but not even 25% as good as Dorothy's seat. Go for the latter. Lands end is included in the trek to Dorothy's seat. Nice views but nothing extraordinary
